comments:
To test something Wassim said, I changed a plugin project's library name from
'.' to 'foo.jar' and exported. Test worked as expected (jar within a jar). But
when I later tried to change the name back to '.' in the Build page, the editor
incorrectly changed it to './'. Then, every time I click on the './' the editor
throws up an error alert. (Had to manually change to "output=.." in build.xml.)

Error 2005-07-09 09:56:25.540 Path must include project and resource name:
